description: ICS techniques used by FrostyGoop, ATT&CK software S1165 (v1.0)
name: FrostyGoop (S1165)

techniques.comment: [FrostyGoop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1165) is compiled for Windows systems and leverages a Windows-based command line interface.(Citation: Dragos FROSTYGOOP 2024) Modbus interaction functionality is based off a publicly available Github repository for command line input.(Citation: Nozomi BUSTLEBERM 2024)
[FrostyGoop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1165) communicates using the Modbus protocol over the standard port of TCP 502.(Citation: Dragos FROSTYGOOP 2024)

[FrostyGoop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1165) allows for the modification of system settings by reading and writing to registers via Modbus commands.(Citation: Dragos FROSTYGOOP 2024)(Citation: Nozomi BUSTLEBERM 2024)
[FrostyGoop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1165) can read data from holding registers via Modbus communication.(Citation: Dragos FROSTYGOOP 2024)
[FrostyGoop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1165) utilizes the Modbus protocol for transmitting commands to victim devices.(Citation: Dragos FROSTYGOOP 2024)
